title: The "Truman Show" Lives of Teenagers Today (w/ Bo Burnham & Ari Shaffir)
description: Ari Shaffir joins the show and discusses Shaggy 2 Dope of Insane Clown posse trying to drop kick Fred Durst of Limp Bizkit during a performance & comedian, and now feature film director, Bo Burnham talks about his movie “Eighth Grade” and the “Truman Show” lives that teenagers are living in the world today.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
